评论详情: There is no hem on the net portion of the dress and there should be at least a rolled hem. The dress runs very small. Buy at least 2 sizes larger and expect to have to do some work on it before you was it. For the price, it’s an okay value.
Not at all true to size unless the one I got was labeled incorrectly. I bought an xxl, this fit like a medium. The chest wasn’t even wide enough for me to get both arms in comfortably.

It’s supposed to be 2x but it’s cut small. Also, seems as if it had the scent of essential oil?! As if someone worn or tried it on and returned it… (probably because it was too small 🥴)… 2 stars because it’s a nice dress but I have to return it.
Absoluely love this dress.

True to size, cute.  Wore it to my 40th HS Reunion.  I wore it with some beige Tommy H tennis sneakers because I have foot issues and it looked edgy and cute together.  Got a lot o fcompliments.  It is different, something you don't see every day.  I felt fun in it.

评论概述: Large and medium exactly same size
评论详情: I bought the Medium and the Large and they fit exactly the same so I will be returning both. I was hoping to obviously save myself some time by buying both, but now this will set me back in looking for a dress. It looks cute on as much as i can fit it but they're both too small and i won't be buying from this company again.
Very cute dress. It’s fit was a true fit for me

I bought this for my daughter’s Halloween costume and while it’s not super high quality, it is actually much better than expected! It wasn’t that expensive and she wore it again this summer for a dinner. If you’re looking for a cheaper, cute dress it’s worth it.
Runs very small
Cheap material just wear one time after washing get so wrinkled never used anymore

My physical deets: 36D, 6ft tall, true XL/14-16, 38F  Fit: ⭐️ Length: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Construction: ⭐️ Material: ⭐️⭐️ Details: ⭐️⭐️⭐️  Overall: 2.5 ⭐️  Overall, okay value for the money. But you could get a better tailored garment anywhere else. This was fairly disappointing. I was able to put a petticoat underneath it, but it just still didn’t look quite right and that was primarily due to the cheap material and the fact that it runs so small that it was laughable. Waist is supposed to be at natural waist. I don’t have a long torso even for a tall person and there was maybe 3-4” of space between my natural waist and the waist of the dress. The bottom of the arm holes hit my armpits and the breast piece that met the mesh on top was far too high. Just a good 3-4” of material missing from this dress to at least look like it was made to fit correctly. I could barely breath in it and I was wearing sharewear.  The cherry on top was that the breast scarring was off to where it should have been and the stitching was coming out so there was a hole in it right out of the box. Could have taken it out a bit if there was more seaming material, but would have been a waste of time.  Returning.
This dress was a hit. Loved it
Wore it to a wedding. Got tons of compliments!
me encanto el vestido .
This was a very pretty dress in the picture. The real thing was not very pretty. Did not fit well.

评论概述: Looks great on,  quality less than perfect
评论详情: I really like the look of this dress on and love the embroidery.  What I don't love is the unfinished hem and the stitching that was unraveling before I even wore it. The hem was also cut slightly uneven- not noticeable when wearing but another note about quality. I don't think this dress is going to hold up well,  but it looked good for the event I needed it for.
The dress fit super well and as expected. I did need to wear a sort of tank top because the mesh at the top is very low cut

It looks nothing like the picture
It's so beautiful. Well made. Just one part in the back where the green thread balled up and looks funny. Going to try and fix it.

评论概述: Could be good for the right person?
评论详情: I’m 5’5” and 105 lb with a small chest so the dress was too big on me and I had to return it. If they made an XS it probably would have worked. The comments about quality are certainly true, but it looks good from far away so that may not be a dealbreaker. The details on the embroidery were super cute, but a lot of them had long, loose threads which I don’t think is acceptable for a nearly $50 dress. The other reviews were correct that the fabric is not hemmed and would likely come apart if someone looked at it too hard. I didn’t have much trouble with the zipper. The inner layer is weird and thin, but I could have overlooked that if it weren’t for the fit. Overall, adorable dress but I felt very meh about the price to quality ratio.
very comfortable

Cute but too big wrong color

I returned this because it looked great if you were far away, but up close the embroidery was really messy and looked cheap

It is way too expensive for such cheap quality. I was so excited for this dress and really disappointed. It is prone to wrinkles, cheaply made, the zipper gets stuck and WAY too small. I am ALWAYS a medium and I couldn’t get this zipper closed. Very sad about this purchase.

Good quality, it was beautiful I used size M , my weight 134, (bra) 36B No stretchy fabric .

I've been eyeing this dress for a while. I finally purchased it for my friend's wedding. I ordered the apricot dress with ruffle sleeve. The dress arrived a little early which was great. It was exactly what I hoped and expected. It's a beautiful dress. Perfect for a spring or summer party. I ordered a size small. I'm 5"4, 123 lbs, apple shape. My build is average, not thin. The dress fit perfectly. Only thing, I was sad that it wasn't flattering on me. I was on the fence. If you like this dress. I would highly recommend buying it and seeing it work for you.

This is a lovely dress, fits me very well (I'm 5'4, 162 lbs, normally a sz 14).  I do wear a pink camisole under it, as the plunging neck is a bit much for someone over 50. One note - there is zero give in the overlay material, so make sure you are ordering the correct size.

Great quality and for. Received many compliments on it.

评论概述: It’s cute but the sizing is not totally standard
评论详情: I’ve gained quite a bit of weight in the last year for a medical reason. I got the biggest size of this dress, which is normally larger than what I’d wear, and it was too small.  If you’re a bigger gal, especially in the waist and chest, maybe skip this one.  Otherwise, I think it’s really lovely. I love the floral details. I’m looking forward to wearing it once I lose some of the weight I gained! I would say size up though regardless of the normal size you wear.

I am a size 4/6 dress and this was a bit big on me. My daughter is a size 0 and her waist is 25 inches. She is 5’ 0” tall. This dress was very big on her in the body. Seems this size small is more like a larger medium. Return was easy. Quality was OK. Perfect for one/two time use. Pretty dress just like the pictures  Three stars based solely on quality.
Fits like a glove! Definitely going to love this for my bridal shower!
Really wanted to love this dress. Beautiful dress but sheer and sleeves puffier than they appear in the photo.

The dress came very pretty and everything I tried it on and when putting the strap on it broke I was rly disappointed because my fathers wedding is this weekend and don’t have time to order a new one so I ended up just sewing and holding it doesn’t come undone

I ordered this dress to use for my engagement photos. When I received it I could immediately see several issues with the dress quality. The embroidery was coming undone in several places, and there were loose threads all over the place. The embroidery was very sparse and there was a random butterfly stitched onto the neckline for whatever reason. All the edges were very ragged and even had chunks of cut up tulle hanging off of the hem.  All of that aside I still tried the dress on with hopes of fixing the other issues but to my surprise the tulle was sewed into the zipper not allowing it to unzip completely. I returned it the very next day. I know ordering clothing off of Amazon is always a gamble but I was shocked at just how terrible the quality was after seeing so many great reviews.

I bought this dress for a Mad Men party & was completely surprised how well it fit & how elegant it looked. Fabulous dress! Perfect for a fun cocktail party.

Beautiful dress. It did require many steams to get rid of wrinkles. But it's mail order right. To be expected. I did not have any issue with the zipper, although I can see where it might be an issue due to the mesh and embroidery. This item DOES run small. Buy a size bugger. 5'5 and, 125 pounds. Ordered a medium and it was too small in the bust (but I'm a large C or small D). Returned and got a large. But that did eliminate the need to use the zipper. Great dress for a good price if wearing for a couple of special occasions.

Material looks cheaper than SHEIN clothes if not worse. Also the dress looks nothing like the photos on the website.

I was truly surprised when this dress arrived. I thought it might be cheap looking and possibly a one use item. However, despite the cheap feeling material and the ridiculous amount of wrinkles (be ready to iron gor awhile), this dress presented absolutely stunning and I received many compliments. Bonus... it will be ready to wear many more times. Perfect for casual and semi-formal occasions. Add a puffy slip under the skirt and a belt for a truly classic look.
Gorgeous, dainty, sexy dress that was so flattering, BUT the zipper was so difficult to move that I'm afraid it will break while wearing.

评论概述: Size chart inaccurate and poor quality.
评论详情: The only nice thing I can say is that the pattern of the overlay is pretty. I used the size chart to ensure that this dress would fit me, but it was too small. Go a size up if you are planning to buy this dress. The underdress is a thin poly fiber of some kind. Also, the overlay and sleeves are a cheap, scratchy tulle. The embroidery looks machine done, which I normally don’t mind, but the ends were not always hidden here. There is a large, noticeable zigzag stitched seam in the overlay that is unsightly, and the raw hem is crooked. Plus, the straps were put on twisted. They would have to be removed, corrected, and stitched back on. Do not recommend, especially given the price.

I got this as a bride's maid dress and it was perfect! Comfortable, stylish, and pretty. On top of that, inexpensive. It cost less than a seventh (yes, 1/7th) of the dresses we got as wedding gowns - and a wedding dress for $350 is cheap.
The dress could not fit

I ordered a large and it was too big and small. I’m 5’3” 185lbs with a big chest. The dress was perfect for my waist, too tight on my chest and neck, sleeves too big/long and the length of the dress was way too long.
love the fit

The fit of the dress was weird and the fabric didn’t stretch at all, so unless it’s the exact shape of your body, it probably won’t fit well. We had to return it.

Well I sized to the XX-L per the reviews and wished I would’ve went with the Amazon recommendation for XL. The dress fits but not like it should. There’s some gaping in the armpit area and in the stomach area where the dress could have laid flatter if I ordered the recommended size. I’m 5’9 38D 190-195lbs for reference. I’ll be returning for the Amazon recommended XL.

I went with the apricot ruffle sleeved one because it had the most positive reviews. I am usually a small to medium in tops, size 4 in jeans and the medium fit perfectly. I added a petticoat under for more fluff. The dress material is thin and does not stretch. The embroidery seems fragile but it’s still great for a tea party. Very comfortable as well.
